name: Restaurant Reckless
description:
Manage a restaurant all by yourself. Press enter to start the game then try and survive as long as you can, micromanaging every aspect of a restaurant. Escape to exit.

Minigame Control
Salt and Pepper: S for salt and P for pepper
Chopping: U and J to chop up and down
Waiting Tables: arrow keys to move the waiter
Fire Extinguisher: E to extinguish
Tray Balancing: N and N to rotate left and right
Wok capture: A and D to move left and right.
